raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

The xpt-pbux mRNA of B. subtilis recognizes guanine, which has a molecular weight of as low as 151.13, at the nM level (Kd<5 nM).
Moreover, LysC mRNA selectively recognizes L-lysine (molecular weight 146.19; Kd=1 μM), though it is not even a derivative of RNA.
